disclosures.details: Accommodation at the David Citadel Hotel in Jerusalem (US$330 per night) from 10-12 December 2010 while attending the Australia-Israel Leadership Forum in Israel.
Accommodation at the Tel Aviv Hilton (US$290 per night) from 13-16 December 2010 while attending the Australia-Israel Leadership Forum in Israel.

Silk tie received from the Minister of State for Textiles during a meeting with the Indian High Commissioner and an official delegation visiting from India on 17 February 2011 at Parliament House. Approximate cost of gift is $50.

disclosures.entity: Executive Director of Climate Change Research Strategy for Primary Industries, Michael Robinson.
disclosures.details: Wooden chopping board handcrafted from Australian Timber received at the opening of the inaugural National Climate Change Research Strategy for Primary Industries Conference in Melbourne on 17 February 2011. The approximate cost of the gift is $50.
Attendance with wife at the opening night of Bell Shakespeare's play Much Ado About Nothing at the Canberra Theatre Centre on Friday 20 May 2011, as guests of the Bell Shakespeare Theatre Company.

disclosures.entity: NSW branch of the Australian Labor Party
disclosures.details: Financial assistance from the NSW branch of the Australian Labor Party towards my defence in a defamation case being brought against me.

disclosures.entity: NSW branch of the Australian Labor Party
disclosures.details: Another payment from the NSW branch of the Australian Labor Party to be used towards my defence in a defamation case being brought against me.

Accommodation at the Park Plaza Westminster Bridge Hotel in London paid for by AICE. Travel to attend Australia Israel UK Leadership Dialogue in December 2012. Nights of the 16th, 17th and 18th December 2012 at a rate of £139.00 + VAT per night, a total £500.40.
